WorkItem.Description:
We are getting the following error in VS2010SP1 with a brand new MVC3 project -

 



CSSLintEngine -- c:\research\MvcApplication1\Content\themes\base\jquery.ui.theme.css
CSSLintEngine -- c:\research\MvcApplication1\Content\themes\base\jquery.ui.tabs.css
CSSLintEngine -- c:\research\MvcApplication1\Content\themes\base\jquery.ui.slider.css
CSSLintEngine -- c:\research\MvcApplication1\Content\themes\base\jquery.ui.selectable.css
CSSLintEngine -- c:\research\MvcApplication1\Content\themes\base\jquery.ui.resizable.css
CSSLintEngine -- c:\research\MvcApplication1\Content\themes\base\jquery.ui.progressbar.css
CSSLintEngine -- c:\research\MvcApplication1\Content\themes\base\jquery.ui.dialog.css
CSSLintEngine -- c:\research\MvcApplication1\Content\themes\base\jquery.ui.datepicker.css
Error: Jurassic.JavaScriptException: ReferenceError: CSSLint is not defined
   at global_(ScriptEngine , Scope , Object )
   at Jurassic.Compiler.GlobalMethodGenerator.Execute()
   at Jurassic.ScriptEngine.Execute(ScriptSource source)
   at Jurassic.ScriptEngine.Execute(String code)
   at UglifyCS.Environment.Run(String script, Expression`1[] vars)
   at UglifyCS.CSSLint.CSSLINT(String source, options options)
   at Zippy.Chirp.Engines.CSSLintEngine.Run(String fullFileName, ProjectItem projectItem)
   at Zippy.Chirp.Engines.EngineManager.Process(ProjectItem projectItem)
CSSLintEngine -- c:\research\MvcApplication1\Content\themes\base\jquery.ui.core.css
CSSLintEngine -- c:\research\MvcApplication1\Content\themes\base\jquery.ui.button.css
CSSLintEngine -- c:\research\MvcApplication1\Content\themes\base\jquery.ui.base.css
CSSLintEngine -- c:\research\MvcApplication1\Content\themes\base\jquery.ui.autocomplete.css
CSSLintEngine -- c:\research\MvcApplication1\Content\themes\base\jquery.ui.all.css
CSSLintEngine -- c:\research\MvcApplication1\Content\themes\base\jquery.ui.accordion.css


 

Any suggestions as to how to correct?

Comments.Message: In my case, it doesn't happen with an MVC3 project, just a regular web application one.
MVC 3 - happens every time I save a JS file in VS2010, which is - every 10 seconds when I'm writing Javascript.  SUPER annoying.

I'm having this annoying issue also (VS2010, Windows 7).

On another chat ( ) i've noticed that saving an offline version somewhere specific could fix this as well:

"This happened to me as well. My workaround was to just download the jshint source and put it in the location "C:\Documents and settings\admin\Local Settings\http___jshint.com_js_jshint.js". Then JSHint worked. The other option is to turn off JSHint. "

Although, i don't know where this should be on a Windows 7 machine??

This is super annoying.  A user found a fix for this which is documented here:

http://chirpy.codeplex.com/discussions/273880

Hopefully this helps!

I'm getting this error as well. Often it happens during code demonstrations and reviews, and I have to explain to the whole room why I'm getting this weird error when I save a perfectly legitimate file. Please fix.
